content:
Timehop notified me that Instagram (a.k.a. Meta) is restricting their API and as such it won't show me my images.

Impeccable timing, since I'm fully gearing up to use the #indieweb and was already planning to download my Insta archive..

I picked "All" for time range and apparently that starts in 1905. So hopefully my Verdun photos will be there too..
